stimulusHtml: If an industry ignores the external costs it generates in its production, which of the following will be true at the competitive market equilibrium output?
choicesHtml: Price will be greater than the marginal social cost.
Price will be less than the marginal social cost.
Price will be equal to the marginal social cost.
Marginal private cost will be equal to marginal social cost.
Marginal private cost will be greater than the marginal social cost.
